Fixed calculation of I-spread for forward started bonds/swaps and/or bonds/swaps which are interest only or have non-bullet redemption structure. For bonds/swaps priced with zero coupon yield curve, swap rate on bond/swap maturity is calculated from zero coupon yield curve using syntethic swap which has the same payment dates and coupon terms as original one, but bullet redemption. For forward started bonds/swaps, swap rate is calculated on bond/swap effective(start) date.

The Performance Calculation now creates synthetic payments for CDS positions that have Position Netting CDS transactions. The transaction closes the positions that should be netted and creates a single new netted position. The transaction does not create any real payments and thus synthetic payments should be created to account for the change in market value.

What are the problems/motivations for the changes?
When making partial reallocations for positions with a high number of tax lots then a rounding check could end up putting a too big correction on single tax lot. By too big it is meant above 2 times the smallest unit of the currency e.g. 0.02 for EUR or USD). This would cause the golden equation to fail for the corrected tax lot.
Secondly reallocation values for Initial Premium and Discount values could become incorrect.
Thirdly if a tax lot had an incorrect value for Balance Initial Premium and Discount and was fully sold a check would be made which could cause Balance Initial Premium and Discount not to go to zero on the tax lot.

What is the proposed solution?
First the rounding check has been improved so a single lot will not get more than 2 times the smallest unit of the currency. Then later golden equation checks on individual tax lot level will be able to ensure that the golden equation holds per tax lot. As a consequence the rounding check for reallocations will affect more tax lots.
Secondly a correction has been made to ensure correct reallocation values for Initial Premium and Discount values.
Thirdly a correction has been made so a check on Initial Premium and Discount values is not executed for fully sold tax lots.
Fixed length of message being displayed in popup window from scd.exe as it would be truncated

In very rear cases Night job was running instead of Date rolling on FOH services. It happens, when the check is running very close to mid night. The issue is fixed.
No Business logic changes. Updates for test setups.

When saving an already existing e.g. 'LendSec' transaction one more time in the 'Dealer Securities Lending' window the 'Elm. Trans. No' of one leg was wrongly overwritten with the 'Elm. Trans. No' of another leg. This has been fixed.
[TECH/3T] - handled data requests in 3T that occur at the same time with timer events - the request is ignored when triggered by a timer function
Changing of branch that is used in imsVcsRoot.kt in closed version
Technical 3T
BJ auto allocate collateral: address the issue during BJ execution. BJ was completely stooped if run against invalid RecallReceive margin call.
Fixed Benchmark IDs and Names not being displayed for not compressed BM lines when Benchmark Compression is On
Updated the column so empty fields are treated as the "None" type.
rename Front Office subj area to Order Management
Remove Broker List type restriction from BR service
3T: If several tabs were open, system could loose track of which form has focus, e.g. when updating data in a field that already had focus when the tab was selected in the browser.
3T: Second level tabs were visible even when they shouldn't (e.g. due to authorization).
3T: Output grids without append rows allowed, should not show any rows in the grid
3T: Grids with dynamically created fields could fail for some specific applications (e.g. "Payment Reconciliation")
Fixed issue with scrolling and focus in Select Fields panel

For 'Call money' positions, if the last interest payment did not fall on the same date as the maturity date, and if the forecast in 'Portfolio Calculation' the 'started on a date after the trade date of the last interest date, the expected CloseCallM transaction was not simulated. This has been fixed.
Adding support for ≥, ≤ and ≠ operators
Margin Manager => Margin Call Tracer applet: Allocation status field of Margin Call result with RecallReceive action was not properly updated after execution of Allocate via Simplex has been done.
Move data to AIDE_MASTER, corrected AggregationResults.Integration tests results
